Text: Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, e̩ mʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ li du je̩; mʼibuku-i du je̩, kʼe̩ lo kʼe̩ ko̩la ñw abunyi Israe̩l.
Abe̩le̩ u mʼalu-mi chi; tak i je̩ ñwu mi mʼibuku le̩ du je̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, mʼibuku kʼu nadu ñw e̩-i du je̩ kʼefu-we̩ ki ko̩. Tak u mʼu du je̩. I la rinyo̩ dab iño̩ ef alu-mi.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, lo kʼe̩ nyʼunyi abo Israe̩l, kʼe̩ kʼo̩la-mi ñwu ma.
Todu i chʼamone̩ ku ma kʼichi kpʼabo kʼichi-ma gbiti egbo̩, oñ ma kpʼuwe̩ ru-i n, chai ugbo abunyi Israe̩l.
I chʼugbo amone̩ ojoji ojoji ku ma kʼichi kpʼabo kʼichi gbiti egbo n, e-kʼe̩ ma neke gbo̩ oji o̩la-ma n. Omi ma kpʼe̩ rʼabo o̩gʼe-le̩ ma ma netiru we̩ chuu.
Abunyi Israe̩l muda anetirʼe̩ n; todu i dʼuma e̩do̩ ku ma netirʼe-mi n; todu abunyi Israe̩l chaka chʼama je̩ja kpʼe̩do̩ ki chʼagbo̩ni.
Go, omi che eju-we̩ ki kparʼeju e-ma, kʼo̩gba oji-we̩ ki gbiti bʼo̩gboji e-ma jo̩.
Omi che kʼo̩gboji-we̩ dab okuta ki gbiti tʼokuta o̩mu le. E̩ ki railo ma n, e̩do̩-we̩ ki dakpu todu ma n, todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ama che.
I ño̩ ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, o̩la du kʼomi aka ñw e̩, e̩ mugba tʼef e̩do̩-we, kʼe̩ la nʼeti-we̩ gbo̩,
kʼe̩ lo, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo abo ku ma ño̩ ma bʼane̩-ma te̩, owñ chʼamo̩ma abo-we̩, kʼe̩ la ka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩, dagba ma gbo̩, dagba ma ko̩.
Tak Afu mʼumi du kwane̩ oñ u gbʼekuku ubi-mi dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩wñ ka afule gbudugbudu, i kakini, Ojima Jihofa ki nʼele akwo uña-wñ le̩;
kpʼekuku ika ame̩wñ iñmi le̩ abu ku ma kado omune̩, kpʼekuku o̩da-ma ki jʼakolo-ma, owñ chʼekuku e̩wñʼka ki afule gbudugbudu.
Abe̩le̩ Afu le̩ mʼumi du kwane̩ oñ i mʼumi du le, oñ u le kpʼe̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩, e̩do̩-mi chʼe̩kpa, o̩wo̩ Jihofa la nʼumi oji nana;
tak u lewa ugbo abo ku ma ño̩ ma jo Te̩labib, ku ma gugu o̩lʼohimini Che̩bar, oñ u kwogugu ugbo ku ma gugu le̩. Oñ awuwu fʼumi mu gugu ef uma o̩mo̩ o̩jo̩ mebie.
Oñ e̩gba kʼo̩jo̩ mebie le̩ jo, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
O̩ma one̩, omi dʼuwe̩ chʼadide abunyi Israe̩l; todule̩ uwe̩ ki gbʼo̩la alu-mi, kʼe̩ la juka ñw ma ñwu mi.

E̩gba kʼu naka ñw e̩ne̩bibi kakini, Eku uwe̩ aku chuu, kʼe̩ ma juka ñw u n, kʼe̩ ma la ko̩la uka eje̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi ki kwo bʼo̩na bibi-wñ te̩ n, todu kʼi fʼoji o̩la-wñ jadu n, e̩ne̩bibi le̩ aku ef abi-wñ ki je̩; omi muda atene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-we̩.
I muda che̩wñ kʼe̩ fʼuka je̩ ñw e̩ne̩bibi, kʼi ma la rida bʼe̩wñ bibi-wñ te̩ n, kpai kwo bʼo̩na bibi-wñ le̩ te̩ n, i aku ef abi-wñ kʼi je̩, uwe̩ muda fʼoji o̩la-we̩ jadu me̩.

Omune̩ de̩ ge̩; e̩gba kʼe̩no̩kpakpa rida bʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa-wñ te̩ kʼi la fʼudu, kʼu la dʼe̩wñ uke̩re̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ, eku i aku; todabu kʼuwe̩ ma juka ñw u n, i aku ef adure-wñ le̩. E̩wñ o̩kpakpa du kʼi la che akwoubi, ma ñʼare̩-wa ge̩ n; omi muda tene e̩bie̩-wñ o̩wo̩-we̩.
Ama iche̩wñ kʼe̩ juka ñw e̩no̩kpakpa le̩ kʼe̩no̩kpakpa ki we edure, kʼi ma dure gc n, i adeju chuu, ukpe̩ kʼi gbʼuka kʼe̩ je̩ ñw u gbo̩; uwe̩ la fʼoji o̩la-we̩ jadu me̩.
O̩wo̩ Jihofa la nʼumi oji o̩mo̩, oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Kwane̩, kʼe̩ dufu nyʼegbili, o̩mo̩ tak u nako̩la ñw e̩.
Abe̩le̩ u kwane̩, oñ u kwodufu nyʼegbili; e̩ la go, ojima Jihofa dago o̩mo̩, i dab ojima kʼu li o̩la ohimini Che̩bar le̩; oñ u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Tak Afu le̩ mugudu tʼef umi, oñ i mʼumi e̩re̩ du dʼane̩; i la ko̩la ñwu mi, oñ i ka ñwu mi kakint, Lo tef unyi-we̩ kʼe̩ fʼo̩na re nyʼo̩la-we̩.
I la chʼuwe̩, O o̩ma one̩, go, ma akʼiku ku ma ba kpo̩chi nyʼuwe̩ o̩la, oñ ma anʼe̩ ji uwe̩, todu kʼe̩ we edufu nyʼef amone̩ le̩.
Omi la aje̩ ñw ukpalu-we̩ gamʼodo̩! enyi-we̩ ate̩, kʼalu-we̩ ki we eko̩la, kʼe̩ ma ñʼaneke chʼadejuru ma ge̩ n; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
Ama e̩gba kʼu nako̩la ñw e̩, nachi alu-we̩, tak uwe̩ aka ñwu ma kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩; e̩ne̩ kʼi agbo̩ kʼi gbo̩; e̩ne̩ ki ako̩ kʼi ko̩; todu abunyi ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n ma che.
